# textMarkupAttributes

**Instance Property**

A dictionary of text style attributes to apply to the text.

## Declaration

```swift
var textMarkupAttributes: [String : Any] { get }
```

## Discussion

The supported keys for this dictionary are defined in `CMTextMarkup.h`.

## Accessing the style attributes

- **textSelector**: A string that identifies the text to which the attributes should apply.

items.description: A string that identifies the text to which the attributes should apply.
items.name: textSelector
